title: India vs Sri Lanka: From Suryakumar Yadav to Yuzvendra Chahal, five visiting players who impressed on the tour
snippet: We've got 11 players to choose from and all eleven are playing," said India coach Rahul Dravid on the eve of the second Test against Sri Lanka. As many as four debut caps were handed during the second T20I,

title: Sri Lanka vs India
snippet: Colombo: Rahul Dravid believes that the new crop of Indian batsmen will learn with experience that "not all wickets will be flat" and they need to develop the art of scrapping it out on low-scoring tracks like the ones on offer during the last two T20 Internationals against Sri Lanka.

title: Sri Lanka eye series win after restricting India to 81
snippet: By Rex Clementine Birthday boy Wanindu Hasaranga is emerging to be a top class match winner as he claimed career best figures of four for nine on his 24th birthday to help Sri Lanka reduce India to 81 for eight in the third and final T-20 International at RPS yesterday.

title: Man dies while being treated at spa in Thalawathugoda
snippet: The Thalangama Police launched investigation after a 36-year-old man has died while being treated at a Spa at Thalawathugoda in Thalangama yesterday.

title: 3rd T20I: Sri Lanka beat India by 7 wickets, win series
snippet: Sri Lanka crushed India by seven wickets to win the third and final T20 International and clinch the three-game series 2-1 here at the R Premadasa Stadium on Thursday. Leg-spinner Wanindu Hasaranga took 4/9 in his four overs to help host restrict India to 81/8 in 20 overs.

title: Man nabbed with Rs. 400Mn worth heroin
snippet: A man was arrested with 40 kg of heroin which has a street value of Rs.400 million during a raid at Rerukana in Bandaragama early this morning.

title: India vs Sri Lanka, 3rd T20I: Bowlers clinch T20I series for Sri Lanka
snippet: Celebrating his 24th birthday in style, leg-spinner Wanindu Hasaranga showed exactly why he is ranked as the No. 2 T20I bowler in the world, taking

title: Cricket: Wanindu Hasaranga steers Sri Lanka to T20 series win over India
snippet: Spinner Wanindu Hasaranga celebrated his birthday by taking four wickets as Sri Lanka beat India by seven wickets and took the three-match Twenty20 series 2-1 in Colombo on Thursday, securing their first series win in the format since 2019.

title: Sri Lanka beat India in third T20I, win series
snippet: Sri Lanka beat a depleted Indian cricket team to win the third T20I and seal the three-match series by a 2-1 margin.India, who are without several players after Krunal Pandya tested positive for the coronavirus,

title: India win toss, elect to bat first against Sri Lanka in series-decider third T20I
snippet: Colombo/IBNS: Indian captain Shikhar Dhawan won the toss and elected to bat first against Sri Lanka in the series-deciding third T20I here Thursday.

title: Man nabbed with Rs. 400Mn worth heroin
snippet: A man was arrested with 40 kg of heroin which has a street value of Rs.400 million during a raid at Rerukana in Bandaragama early this morning.

title: I may even cross over to another party if necessary: Rajitha
snippet: SJB MP- Rajitha Senaratne said he will cross over to another party if he feels necessary.

title: Series' chumminess quotient high as young Sri Lanka take advice from Dhawan, Dravid
snippet: Shanaka on chat with Dhawan: "We get advice from our former players too, but this was a chance to hear from a current player with a lot of experience"

title: Sri Lanka wins T20 series against India
snippet: Leg spinner Wanindu Hasaranga recorded a career-best four wickets for nine runs Thursday as Sri Lanka beat India by seven wickets in the third and final Twenty20 international and clinched the three-match series 2-1.

title: I may even cross over to another party if necessary: Rajitha
snippet: SJB MP- Rajitha Senaratne said he will cross over to another party if he feels necessary.

title: Sri Lanka vs India: Krunal Pandya Remains In Isolation As Team India Leave Sri Lanka, Says Report
snippet: According to a PTI report, the Indian cricket contingent on Friday left the Sri Lankan shores after completing a six-match white-ball series but visiting all-rounder Krunal Pandya remained in mandatory isolation to recover from COVID-19.

title: Birthday boy Hasaranga stars as Sri Lanka clinch T20 series
snippet: Spinner Wanindu Hasaranga took four wickets on his 24th birthday to help Sri Lanka thrash India by seven wickets yesterday and claim the three-match Twenty20 series 2-1. Hasaranga returned career-best T20 figures of 4-9 with his leg-spin as India finished on a paltry 81-8,

title: Cricket: Shikhar Dhawan says, 'it was a difficult situation' as Sri Lanka win first bilateral series win over India since 2008
snippet: Shikhar Dhawan, the skipper of India's tour to Sri Lanka praised the "tremendous" attitude of the team despite losing the T20I series 2-1 against the Lankans. In the post-match presentation, Dhawan, who fell for a golden duck in the opening over,

title: Sanju Samson would be disappointed looking back at series against Sri Lanka: Rahul Dravid
snippet: Sanju Samson has now failed in nine consecutive T20I matches since last year and these are not good signs for the wicketkeeping-batsman.

title: Sri Lanka sees highest single-day vaccination total
snippet: Sri Lanka on Thursday administered more than 500,000 COVID-19 vaccine doses making it highest single-day number of jabs.

title: Are Pakistan-Sri Lanka Ties Emerging From India's Shadow?
snippet: From Imran Khan's visit to stronger trade ties, Pakistan's much-touted shift from geopolitics to geoeconomics is on display in Sri Lanka.

title: Sri Lanka cricket trio face long bans for virus breach
snippet: The five-member panel told Sri Lanka Cricket that vice-captain Kusal Mendis and opening batter Danushka Gunathilaka should be barred from all forms of the game for two years, the sources said.

title: India VS Sri Lanka: Two more Indian players tested COVID positive
snippet: Chahal and Gowtham were isolated after having come in close contact with Krunal Pandya, who tested positive earlier

title: Price of domestic electrical wiring reduced
snippet: The price of domestic electrical wiring has been reduced by 11%, State Minister Lasantha Alagiyawanna said.

title: 'Sri Lanka Cricket Tour a Waste For India'
snippet: In a column, former India Test cricketer Yajurvindra Singh reckons that the decision to send a young squad to the Sri Lanka tour has proved to be a wasteful exercise and termed it as a goodwill gesture on the part of the BCCI to help the financially struggling Sri Lankan cricket board.

title: Out gymnast on panel to focus on plight of LGBTQ people in Sri Lanka
snippet: Luke Strong wants to use his position to raise awareness of LGBTQ issues in Sri Lanka. An out champion trampoline gymnast is part of a webinar this weekend to highlight the struggles of LGBTQ people in Sri Lanka,

title: Chahal, Gowtham test positive for COVID-19 in Sri Lanka
snippet: Cricbuzz has learnt that Yuzvendra Chahal and K Gowtham have returned positive results for COVID in Sri Lanka on Friday (July 30). The duo, along with Krunal Pandya, will remain in the island nation for the time being.

title: India vs Sri Lanka: After Krunal Pandya, Yuzvendra Chahal and Krishnappa Gowtham test positive for COVID-19
snippet: All rounder Krunal Pandya tested positive for COVID 19 on Tuesday and eight Indian players Prithvi Shaw Suryakumar Yadav Hardik Pandya Yuzvendra Chahal Deepak Chahar Manish Pandey Ishan Kishan and Kri

title: Two more Indian players test positive for Covid-19
snippet: Team India have received some bad news as spinners Yuzvendra Chahal and Krishnappa Gowtham have also tested positive for Covid-19.

title: Chahal, Gowtham test positive; to stay back in Sri Lanka: BCCI official
snippet: Hardik Pandya, Manish Pandey, Ishan Kishan, Suryakumar Yadav, Prithvi Shaw and Deepak Chahar -- are free to depart the country

title: Proteas to tour Sri Lanka in September
snippet: Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) has confirmed that the country will host South Africa in a white-ball series in September.

title: Sri Lanka beat India in third T20I, win series
snippet: Sri Lanka beat a depleted Indian cricket team to win the third T20I and seal the three-match series by a 2-1 margin. India, who are without several

title: 3rd T20I: Sri Lanka Beat India by 7 Wickets, Win Series
snippet: India lost the 3-match T20I series against Sri Lanka 2-1 after COVID-19 hit the visitors camp and forced changes.

title: This is what Rahul Dravid said following India's T20I series loss against Sri Lanka
snippet: Colombo: Indian head coach Rahul Dravid has said that he was not disappointed by the performance of the young batsmen in the T20I series against Sri Lanka. He believed that the youngsters have to keep getting better in future.

title: Sri Lanka win third T20I, register their maiden T20I series win against India
snippet: The brief summary might tell fans that India lost a series against Sri Lanka after 13 years, but years later when historians flip through the pages, they will realize that India had emerged the true winner against a problem the world was struggling to cope with.

title: Judges get new circular to expedite child abuse trials in HC
snippet: A special circular has been issued by the Judicial Service Commission to all the High Court Judges to streamline and expedite child abuse trials in High Courts.

title: Body of 16-year-old girl exhumed for second autopsy
snippet: The body of the 16 year-old-girl who died under tragic circumstances while working as a domestic helper at MP Rishad Bathiudeen’s residence, has been exhumed and subsequently sent to the Peradeniya Teaching hospital for the second post-mortem.
